nodes.text: Shaketown was a locality on the planet Gorse. Rae Sloane once had a conversation with Lal Grallik and Shaketown's mayor, during her and Denetrius Vidian's inspection visit to the world of Gorse.
The location was also where Kanan Jarrus and Hera Syndulla first met, during a fight against the Sarlaccs gang, of which Charko was a member.
